parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action that was performed - post-tense, e.g., 'created' or 'commented on'

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Target that the action was performed on, e.g., 'issue 1234'

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description:
Optional topic for the activity entry. Topics are essentially comment thread IDs.
     *                          Examples: 'reviews/1234' or 'jobs/job001234'

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Optional description of object or activity to provide context

parameters.name: change
parameters.description:
Optional changelist ID this activity is related to. Used to filter activity related to
     *                          restricted changes.

parameters.name: streams[]
parameters.description:
Optional array of streams to display on. This can include user-initiated actions
     *                          ('user-alice'), activity relating to a user's followed projects/users
     *                          ('personal-alice'), review streams ('review-1234'), and project streams
     *                          ('project-exampleproject').

operations.notes:
Creates an entry in the Activity List.
               Note: admin-level privileges are required for this action.
